string.value: You need to hand a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to #bBruce#k in #bHenesys#k.
I have just one more request for you. Would you be willing to listen?

To be honest, this #bKiller Spore Potion#k is not completely my own work. Do you remember #bBruce#k from #bHenesys#k? I have been friends with him since childhood, and the formula for the #bKiller Spore Potion#k was completed only after Bruce shared the results of his studies with me. This was all thanks to him, so I'd like for you to deliver this to him for me.
I wanted you to share this great piece of news with #bBruce#k, but I understand if you're busy.
Oh! You're here on behalf of #bScarrs#k?

Ahh, so this is the #bKiller Spore Potion#k that I was studying way back when! I had a tough time gathering up all the ingredients, so I left my research in a state of mere hypotheticals. I guess Scarrs was able to complete it. And he even had you bring a sample as well. Please tell him thank you.
